description: An obvious mixture of two sequences.
formula: G.f.: (1+x+x^3)/(1-x^2)^2, even: a(2*n) = n+1, odd: a(2*n-1) = 2*n-1.a(n)=(3n+2)/4+(2-n)(-1)^n/4; a(n)=2a(n-2)-a(n-4). Binomial transform is A098156. - _Paul Barry_, Aug 29 2004Contribution from _Gary W. Adamson_, May 08 2010: (Start)Let M = an infinite lower triangular matrix with (1, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0,...)in every column; for columns >0, shifted down twice from the previous column.Then A029579 = M * [1, 2, 3, 0, 0, 0,...]. (End)
